title: Covid-19 live updates: In England, eating inside and hugs are allowed again as coronavirus restrictions ease
content:
1. Covid-19 live updates: In England, eating inside and hugs are allowed again as coronavirus restrictions ease  The Washington Post
  2. Covid: Increasing confidence jabs work against Indian variant  BBC News
  3. Britain eases lockdown but Covid variant from India threatens summer freedom  CNBC
  4. The Observer view on the spread of the Indian variant in the UK  The Guardian
  5. Count me out! Allowing people inside pubs is foolish – and Matt Hancock knows it  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: Covid-19のライブアップデート。イングランドでは、コロナウイルスの規制が緩和され、室内での食事やハグが再び許可されました。
Covid-19实时更新。在英国，随着冠状病毒限制的放松，人们又可以在室内吃饭和拥抱了。
Covid-19實時更新。在英國，隨着冠狀病毒限制的放鬆，人們又可以在室內喫飯和擁抱了。
